alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Gibson; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:31AM CDT until further notice by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee... Obion River near Obion For the Obion River...including Obion...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Obion River near Obion. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Rives is flooding. Most cropland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this evening. It will continue to rise to 36.5 feet by Monday evening. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
